title: What is a medical imaging doctor? - Quora

response.answer_text: The doctors in medical imaging may be radiologists and some specialize in particular scans. A Cardiologist will be involved in nuclear stress test imagery. There are those who are specialists in oncology and surgery done under stereotactic imagery. There are also interventional radiologists who may do biopsies under radiologic guidance. Pain management doctors and other surgeons use assistive fluoroscopic guidance.
